summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Lumina Gallery image service. Backend APIs 100% functional, frontend fully working with end-to-end workflows tested. Fixed critical CSS overlay issue preventing image clicks.

test_infrastructure_issues.issue: Motor async event loop closed error in pytest
test_infrastructure_issues.impact: Unit tests fail but API functionality unaffected
test_infrastructure_issues.details: RuntimeError: Event loop is closed when Motor tries to execute database operations in test environment

fixed_issues.issue: Image overlay blocking clicks on images
fixed_issues.fix_applied: Added pointer-events: none to overlay and pointer-events: auto to buttons

passed_tests: Backend API: All 11 endpoints (upload, list, filter, get, download, delete)
Frontend: Upload dialog and form functionality
Frontend: Filter dialog and form functionality
Frontend: Gallery grid display and masonry layout
Frontend: Image viewer dialog with metadata
